front.title: Considerations for Unreliable Streams in QUIC

abstract.t: This memo outlines support for unreliable streams in QUIC. This draft contains a collection of considerations and requirements for unreliable streams in QUIC based on [I-D.draft-ietf-quic-transport]. It provides to alternatives demonstrating how unreliable streams can be realized. The intention of this document is to collect considerations regarding unreliable streams in QUIC and to frame the design space. All content of this memo is supposed to be merged into [I-D.draft-ietf-quic-transport], [I-D.draft-ietf-quic-recovery] and, [I-D.draft-ietf-quic-applicability] once unreliable streams get integrated with QUIC.
